class gravitate.models.target.Target(event_category)[source]¶

static create_airport_event_target(to_event: bool, earliest: int, latest: int)[source]¶
static create_social_event_target(to_event: bool, earliest: int, latest: int)[source]¶
create_with_flight_local_time(to_event, offset_low_abs_sec: int = 7200, offset_high_abs_sec: int = 18000)¶
This method creates a target with flightLocal Time. The offsets represents how much in advance

is user’s preferred earliest and latest.

Limitations:
this method won’t work if any datetime string represents a time when

daylight saving ends (November 4 1:00AM-2:00AM). since anytime in between corresponds to more than one possible UTC time.

Parameters

  • flight_local_time –

  • to_event –

  • offset_low_abs_sec – The offset with lower absolute value.

  • offset_high_abs_sec – The offset with higher absolute value.

Returns

create_with_local_time_str(earliest_lts, latest_lts, ride_category)¶
Note that this method won’t work if any datetime string represents a time when

daylight saving ends (November 4 1:00AM-2:00AM). since anytime in between corresponds to more than one possible UTC time.

param earliest_lts

earliest local time string

param latest_lts

latest local time string

gravitate.models.target.create_target_with_flight_local_time(flight_local_time, to_event, offset_low_abs_sec: int = 7200, offset_high_abs_sec: int = 18000)[source]¶
This method creates a target with flightLocal Time. The offsets represents how much in advance

is user’s preferred earliest and latest.

Limitations:
this method won’t work if any datetime string represents a time when

daylight saving ends (November 4 1:00AM-2:00AM). since anytime in between corresponds to more than one possible UTC time.

Parameters

  • flight_local_time –

  • to_event –

  • offset_low_abs_sec – The offset with lower absolute value.

  • offset_high_abs_sec – The offset with higher absolute value.

Returns

daylight saving ends (November 4 1:00AM-2:00AM). since anytime in between corresponds to more than one possible UTC time.
